title: Technical problem
body:
League doesn't let me start the game, I tried to repair it but It stopped responding and closed, after opening again will show me 2 messages and the only option is to restart the client and this just loops again and again.

http://imgur.com/a/abdUo

Should I reinstall?

replies.body: Can you confirm you're running the League executable as admin? Simply right click on the *LeagueClient.exe* file and select "run as administrator". Let me know if this caused any change.
